column4: My install of Ubuntu 11.04 won't boot; end up with the initram error, etc. From a "Live" CD, how can I repair/restore the Grub files?
Better hurry up, support for 11.04 is running out thick and fast
Why can't you just grab another CD (or wipe the USB on) and place 12.04 on it?
It is the easiest way to do it
